job_description:
Company: AILabs
Position: Machine Learning Engineer
Location: Boston, MA (Hybrid)
Salary: $140,000 - $190,000

About Us:
AILabs is an artificial intelligence company that develops cutting-edge machine learning solutions. We are passionate about using AI to solve real-world problems.

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Machine Learning Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and deploying machine learning models into production.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and train machine learning models using TensorFlow or PyTorch.
- Implement and maintain machine learning pipelines.
- Collaborate with data scientists and engineers to deploy models into production.
- Monitor model performance and retrain models as needed.

Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience in machine learning engineering.
- Strong proficiency in Python and machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch.
- Experience with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure.
- Knowledge of machine learning algorithms and techniques.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with MLOps tools and practices.
- Experience with deep learning.
- Experience with natural language processing (NLP).

Benefits:
- Opportunity to work on challenging and impactful projects.
- Access to cutting-edge AI technologies.
- Collaborative and supportive work environment.
